CustomField.description: This setting controls how TaskRay Projects can be completed via the 'Complete' button. "Simple" offers the choice to set the 'Completed' checkbox on a Project; "Choice" will prompt the user to choose between completing the Project or launching the Flow specified in the 'Completion Flow' custom setting; "Flow" will automatically launch the Flow specified in the 'Completion Flow' custom setting.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: TaskRay Projects can be completed via the 'Complete' button. "Simple" offers the choice to set the 'Completed' checkbox on a Project; "Choice" will prompt the user to choose how to complete the project.
CustomField.label: Project Completion Option
